home.description: I am a young independent French developer. I do iOS/iPadOS apps on the App Store, Minecraft mods, and rarely content creation
home.socials: Find Lumaa on the internet here:

tictac.caption: Remember the things that matter to you, count down the events that are dear to your heart, and observe the tasks that are left for you.

description.one: By using TicTac, you can record your reminders with various levels of importance. There is also a notification feature that alerts you several hours in advance, turning your reminder into a live activity and in your
description.two:
. You can mark it as completed at any time of the day, either from the application or through the reminders widget.

You will also find counters that counts down in real-time from the current date to a date of your choice. You can associate an icon that best represents the event, visible on your home and lock screens thanks to the counters widget. Additionally, you can display a counter in your
description.three:
and view it as a live activity on your lock screen.

Finally, organize your tasks from the application by selecting a descriptive icon for each task. You have the option to designate tasks as essential to never forget them.

usmp.body: The Unknown SMP is a private Minecraft server half-scripted half-survival, created by Lumaa and Patate Givrée. The Unknown SMP is entirely running in The Backrooms, mod also by Lumaa (V-Fast).

limitations.none: This logo is free to use, can be altered, scaled, rotated, etc... with no limitations.
